description: This file defines a React functional component GameScreen which implements the UI and logic for a Tic Tac Toe game. It manages game state, score persistence, user interactions, and modal dialogs for game over conditions, integrating custom components like Board, Controls, and Scoreboard.

methods.name: restartBoard
methods.description: Resets the game board to the initial empty state, clears winning line, resets game over flag, sets current player to 'X', and hides result modal.

methods.name: resetScores
methods.description: Resets the score state for both players to zero and persists the reset scores to storage.

methods.name: handleCellPress
methods.description: Handles user pressing a cell: updates board, checks for winner or draw, updates scores, and triggers game over modal.
